colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @362B SMRAS PA, LUS STOD MGO BO NAS BZUNG RKANG MTHIL BAR, ,BZHI BRGYA RTZA BZHI'I NAR GYIS MNAR BA LA, ,PHAN BYED GNYEN PO'I SMAN SBYOR MU TIG 'PHRENG, ,TSIG GI SRAD BU LA RGYUS DO SHAL 'DI, ,SKAL MNYAM GDUL BYA DGA' BA'I RNA RGYAN DU, ,'GYUR RAM SNYAM NAS ^'JAM DPAL MING CAN GYIS, ,YI GER BKOD PA'I DGE 'DIS 'GRO BA KUN, ,SMAN PA'I RGYAL PO'I GO 'PHANG MCHOG THOB SHOG , ,,'DI LTAR BSKRUN PA'I DGE TSOGS RGYA MTSO'I MTHUS, ,ZHUS DAG YON SBYOR BRIS BRKOS DANG BCAS PAS, THOG DRANGS @363A *, ,MKHA' KHYAB RIGS DRUG LUS CAN RNAMS, ,GNAS SKABS BSAM PA'I DON KUN 'GRUB PA DANG, ,KHYAD PAR RGYU 'BRAS NAD LAS THAR GYUR CIG ,RTAG TU ZAG MED BDE DANG LDAN GYU NAS, ,MTHAR THUGS LAM BGROD PA MTHAR PHYIN TE, ,SKU GSUM GO 'PHANG BDE BLAG THOB PAR SHOG , ,SMAN SBYOR MU TIG 'PHRENG BA'I MAN NGAG 'DI, ,CHOS SBYIN 'DOD MED SPEL PHYIR MTSO BDUN NAS, ,LHA KHANG SER PO'I DEM CHI DPAL 'BYOR GYIS, ,DPAR DU GRUB PA'I RNAMS DKAR DGE BA'I MTHUS, ,THUB BSTAN DAR ZHING BLA MA'I ZHABS BAD BTAN, ,RGYU SBYOR LTOS BCAS MA RGAN SEMS CAN RNAMS, ,BDER GSHEGS BRGYAD KYIS BRTZE BA'I RJES BZUNG STE, ,SKU GSUM GO 'PHANG MYUR DU THOB PAR SHOG , ,,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,BKRA SHIS DGE'O,, ,,
